news.title: Bitcoin passes $69K on slower US CPI print, but Fed rate-cut odds stay low
news.titleOriginal: Bitcoin passes $69K on slower US CPI print, but Fed rate-cut odds stay low
news.summary: Bitcoin bulls enjoyed a relief rally to $69,000 on the back of soft US CPI inflation data amid hopes of BTC price action making a "higher low."

news.titleOriginal: Are quantum-proof Bitcoin wallets insurance or a fear tax?

news.title: Crypto CEO gets 20 years for $200M Bitcoin Ponzi scheme
